name: DogVision
desc: A web app that uses a pre-trained model to detect the breed of dogs in images. It uses Tensorflow and Keras for the model and Flask for the backend. It uses React for the frontend. Note: The backend is not hosted on a server since the model is too large to be hosted on a free server.

name: dev/Mitul - Web Portfolio
desc: My personal web portfolio built with React. It uses ReactBits Components for the UI and CSS for the styling. Feel free to check it out!

name: Bone.ai
tech: {Tensorflow, YOLOv8, React, Spring Boot,  Git, GitHub}
desc: A web app that can be used to detect fractures in X-ray of bones. It uses Tensorflow and YOLOv8 for the model and Spring Boot for the backend. It uses React for the frontend.
